patient_info: Abnormality of refraction,Visual loss,Cafe-au-lait spot,Cranial hyperostosis,Large cafe-au-lait macules with irregular margins,Polyostotic fibrous dysplasia,Abnormal shape of the occiput
golden_diagnosis: McCune-Albright 综合征/McCune-Albright syndrome; MAS/McCune-Albright syndrome/McCune-Albright syndrome, somatic, mosaic,McCune-Albright 综合征/McCune-Albright syndrome; MAS/McCune-Albright syndrome/McCune-Albright syndrome, somatic, mosaic,McCune-Albright 综合征/McCune-Albright syndrome; MAS/McCune-Albright syndrome/McCune-Albright syndrome, somatic, mosaic
predict_diagnosis:
1. fibrous dysplasia of the bones (polyostotic)
2. neurofibromatosis type 1 (NF1)
3. Cherubism
4. Paget's disease of the bone
5. osteogenesis imperfecta
6. craniosynostosis
7. Albright's syndrome
8. melanocytosis
9. fibrodysplasia ossificans progressiva (FOP)
10. rare genetic disorders affecting bone growth and mineralization (e.g., Bardet-Biedl syndrome, osteopetrosis)

Please note that these top 10 diagnoses are based on the patient's reported phenotype and are meant to provide a diverse and comprehensive differential diagnosis. Additional clinical information, laboratory tests, and imaging studies may be necessary to narrow down the final diagnosis.
